DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether installation sit-stand work station could lead decrease sedentary time increase physical activity workday among sedentary office worker .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Sit-Stand Workstations Physical Activity Sedentary Office Workers
DOC.criteria: Mostly sedentary ( sit ≥ 4 hour ) workday . Age ≥ 18 Anticipated use single computer workstation 20 hour per week Unable stand least two hour per workday ( two hour whole workday , consecutively ) Reported severe musculoskeletal symptom , specifically low extremity lower back pain . Diagnosed treatment diabetes , heart disease , cancer , orthostatic hypertension , varicose vein , autoimmune disease , chronic disease . Pregnant woman
